BugInstance.message: Write to static field com.ericsson.research.trap.spi.transports.ListenerHttpTransport.listenerNum from instance method new com.ericsson.research.trap.spi.transports.ListenerHttpTransport()
com.ericsson.research.trap.spi.transports.ServerHttpTransport.handle(HttpExchange) invokes inefficient new Long(long) constructor; use Long.valueOf(long) instead
Exception is caught when Exception is not thrown in com.ericsson.research.trap.spi.transports.ServerHttpTransport.handle(HttpExchange)
